extractive: CloudyML | AI ML trainer | Remote • Mentored students through the end-to-end development of machine learning projects, translating complex theoretical concepts in NLP and computer vision into practical, portfolio-ready solutions. • Created structured and industry-aligned learning modules covering key topics like ETL processes, data preprocessing, and predictive analytics to enhance skill development and job readiness. • Designed and guided end-to-end AI/ML projects, including data preprocessing, model building, evaluation, and deployment, using tools like Scikit-learn, Pandas, TensorFlow, and Power BI. • Performed exploratory data analysis (EDA) using SQL to identify sales trends, customer behavior, and key business metrics, enhancing strategic planning.
abstractive: Mohammad Hayat is an MCA holder with strong proficiency in Python, SQL, Power BI, AI, ML, Generative AI, and Prompt Engineering. He possesses extensive experience as an AI/ML and Data Science trainer, having mentored thousands of students and professionals across multiple institutions and corporate settings. His work history highlights a significant focus on delivering hands-on training in Python, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, SQL, and Data Visualization, guiding learners through end-to-end project development and industry-aligned modules. Hayat's practical expertise is demonstrated through projects like an AI-powered stock analysis system, a CNN-based plant disease prediction model, and retail sales analysis using SQL and Python. Notable achievements include training over 250 Infosys employees, conducting specialized Generative AI programs, and a consistent track record as a freelance and part-time Data Science trainer.
